synopsis.text:
Top ping the charts of virtual card games, 'WIXOSS' has gained a massive following, with its online platform, 'WIXOSS LAND', becoming a hotspot for gamers worldwide. The game's unique twist allows players to embody their LRIG avatars, making the experience even more immersive. The most sought-after game mode is the 'Diva Battle', where trios join forces to compete against rival teams, aiming to amass the highest number of 'Selector' followers. With diverse team themes ranging from idols to DJs and bands, the competition is fierce and entertaining.

Enter Asu Hirana, a first-year high school student, who has been captivated by the legend of the 'Eternal Girl' since her childhood. This enigmatic figure is renowned for captivating Selectors with her mesmerizing performances and formidable strength. With a burning desire to become a Top Diva herself, Asu embarks on a challenging journey into the world of 'Diva Battles'. To achieve her dream, she must face countless adversaries and overcome numerous obstacles in her quest for stardom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
